title: Facile and efficient transformation of thiols to disulfides via a radical pathway with N-anomeric amide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17780-17784
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03545C, Paper

Xiaobo Xu, Leyu Yan, Weijie Huang, Yanping Wang, Mengya Wang, Liming Feng, Panpan Wang, Shengqiang Wang
New application of Levin's reagent. No metal and additive reagents. Good functional group tolerance under mild conditions. Broad substrate scope for both aliphatic & aromatic disulfides.
